resources.string: This device is not a Samsung device.
This device does not support S-Pen
You need to install additional S-Pen software to use this application. You will be taken to the installation screen. Restart this application after the software has been installed.
You need to update your S-Pen software to use this application. You will be taken to the installation screen. Restart this application after the software has been updated.
This device does not support S-Pen.\nYou can draw strokes with your finger.
